CustomField.formula: IF(((ISPICKVAL(SFA_Cap_Time_Horizon__c,"1st renewal only")) && (ISPICKVAL(Renewal_Increase_SFA_Cap__c,"5%")|| ISPICKVAL(Renewal_Increase_SFA_Cap__c,"3%"))|| (((ISPICKVAL(SFA_Cap_Time_Horizon__c,"Thru 2nd renewal")) || (ISPICKVAL(SFA_Cap_Time_Horizon__c,"Thru 3rd Renewal")))&& (ISPICKVAL(Renewal_Increase_SFA_Cap__c,"10%")|| ISPICKVAL(Renewal_Increase_SFA_Cap__c,"5%")))|| ((ISPICKVAL(SFA_Cap_Time_Horizon__c,"Thru 3rd Renewal")) && (ISPICKVAL(Renewal_Increase_SFA_Cap__c,"Greater of CPI or 5%")|| ISPICKVAL(Renewal_Increase_SFA_Cap__c,"Greater of RPI or 5%")))|| ((ISPICKVAL(SFA_Cap_Time_Horizon__c,"Perpetual")) && (OR(ISPICKVAL(Renewal_Increase_SFA_Cap__c,"RPI + 10%"),ISPICKVAL(Renewal_Increase_SFA_Cap__c,"CPI + 10%"),ISPICKVAL(Renewal_Increase_SFA_Cap__c,"CPI + 5%"),ISPICKVAL(Renewal_Increase_SFA_Cap__c,"RPI + 5%"),ISPICKVAL(Renewal_Increase_SFA_Cap__c,"Greater of RPI or 10%"),ISPICKVAL(Renewal_Increase_SFA_Cap__c,"Greater of CPI or 10%"))))),3, IF((ISPICKVAL(SFA_Cap_Time_Horizon__c,"Perpetual")) && (ISPICKVAL(Renewal_Increase_SFA_Cap__c,"10%")|| ISPICKVAL(Renewal_Increase_SFA_Cap__c,"5%") || ISPICKVAL(Renewal_Increase_SFA_Cap__c,"Greater of CPI or 5%") || ISPICKVAL(Renewal_Increase_SFA_Cap__c,"Greater of RPI or 5%")),4, IF(OR(ISPICKVAL(Renewal_Increase_SFA_Cap__c,"CPI + 10%"),ISPICKVAL(Renewal_Increase_SFA_Cap__c,"CPI + 5%"),ISPICKVAL(Renewal_Increase_SFA_Cap__c,"Greater of CPI or 10%"),ISPICKVAL(Renewal_Increase_SFA_Cap__c,"Greater of CPI or 5%"),ISPICKVAL(Renewal_Increase_SFA_Cap__c,"RPI + 10%"),ISPICKVAL(Renewal_Increase_SFA_Cap__c,"RPI + 5%"),ISPICKVAL(Renewal_Increase_SFA_Cap__c,"Greater of RPI or 10%"),ISPICKVAL(Renewal_Increase_SFA_Cap__c,"Greater of RPI or 5%"),ISPICKVAL(Renewal_Increase_SFA_Cap__c,"10%")),2,0)))
CustomField.label: SFA Level
